author: rufusg.
content: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/issues/307 I wanted to get the ball rolling on possibly adding the value of the locally built block to the engine api. There was some back and forth on this premerge but it was decided to postpone any decisions/changes until after the merge.

author: rufusg.
content: The main motivation is to increase the cost for builders to censor transactions but also provides some general protections against builder dishonesty, underperformance, and centralization.
